Lucien's stock ticker application

Instructions: Input year, month, and stock name, and then press 'Submit.' This will return a Bokeh plot of the stock's closing prices over that month. NOTE: The application will return data for AAPL if the entered stock code is invalid, or if Quandl does not allow free access for that stock code in its end-of-day dataset.
